1.text: And of the times and seasons, brethren, ye have no need to write to you.

2.text: For ye yourselves know accurately that the day of the Lord, as a thief in the night, so comes.

3.text: For when they say, Peace and security; then sudden ruin is upon them, as anguish in her with child; and they may not escape.

4.text: And ye, brethren, are not in darkness, that the day as a thief overtake you.

5.text: Ye are all sons of light, and sons of day: we are not of night, nor of darkness.

6.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as also the rest; but let us watch and be sober.

7.text: For they sleeping sleep in the night; and they drunken are drunken in the night.

8.text: And we, being of the day, let us be sober, putting on the coat of mail of faith and love; and a helmet, the hope of salvation.

9.text: For God set us not for wrath, but for the acquisition of salvation by our Lord Jesus Christ,

10.text: He having died for us, that, whether we watch or sleep, we should live together with him.

11.text: Wherefore comfort one another, and build up one another, as also ye do.

12.text: And we ask you, brethren, to know those being fatigued among you, and set over you in the Lord, and reminding you;

13.text: And to think them above ordinary in love for their work. Live in peace in yourselves.

14.text: And we beseech you, brethren, remind the disorderly, encourage the timid, sustain the weak, and be slow to anger to all.

15.text: See that any return not evil to any: but always pursue good to one another, and to all.

18.text: In every thing return thanks: for this the will of God in Christ Jesus toward you.

21.text: Try all things; hold the good.

22.text: Keep away from all appearance of evil.

23.text: And the same God of peace consecrate you perfectly compete; and your whole spirit and soul and body be kept faultless to the arrival of our Lord Jesus Christ.

24.text: Faithful he calling you, who also will do.

26.text: Greet all the brethren in a holy kiss.

27.text: I bind you by oath, for the epistle to be read to all the holy brethren.

28.text: The Grace of our Lord Jesus Christ with you. Amen.
